description:
Brenta is your first choice for high mountain via ferrata routes. A via ferrata boot must be comfortable for hiking the long approaches, compatible with crampons for crossing snow patches and must be precise for climbing and tricky scrambling. Brenta has been designed to do all this with ease.

***Please Note: Sizing is in UK (See Size Chart for Reference)
name: Boreal (Spain) Brenta Hiking Boots - Mens
